Topic.Title: DevMode - Web version - error at loading

Posts.EditableText:
Hello everyone,
I began to use quest not so long ago, and discover the devMode option I thought it was a great idea to use it (I have a bug I can't see and I had hoped it would be a good tools to identify it). 
I'm on the web version, as I don't currently have administrator rights (btw, is there a reason for administrator rights ?)

I have a curious error message when I launch my play
```DevMode: Active

Verbs assigned.
Error running script: Error evaluating expression 'GetFileData("DevMode/tabulator.css")': The remote server returned an error: (404) Not Found.
```

My quest-code seems relatively simple. It is just a poc for a deckbuilding game, and I'm working on the process of drawing and discarding cards with effects.
I had high hopes for the devMode and maybe understanding where my code is bugged (but it is another topic)

I thought we could see variables and more about the scripts created, but I don't understand how to use it with custom verbs (but that another topic)

I just wanted to make sure :
1) I could use DevMode in the web version 
2) This error was known or not important 

Thanks !

Posts.EditableText:
The DevMode dont work in web version.

When Pixie return we work on solve the errors of the new Quest version.

Sorry.
